description: If n = Product p_i^e_i then p_i<e_i for all i.
example: 8 appears in the list because 8 = 2^3 and 2<3.
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = {for (n=2, nn, f = factor(n); ok = 1; for (i=1, #f~, if (f[i, 1] >= f[i, 2], ok = 0; break;);); if (ok, print1(n, ", ")););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 15 2013
author: _James A. Sellers_, Apr 22 2000
